line_2: She slights what erst She singly fear'd:

line_1: Henceforth associate in one common herd,
line_2: Go quit the rank to which ye stood preferred,

line_1: Sent Elspa to service, and Jocky to herd;
line_2: It is true, my dear Harry, I toil'd verra hard,

line_1: Command the Seas, and rule the floating Herd.
line_2: Dolphins, by all the liquid Realms rever'd,

line_1: And tepid showers bedew the frolic herd,
line_2: With daisies crimson-tipt, and green parterr'd,

line_1: And made the Chief of all the finny Herd.
line_2: The Dolphins are to meaner Fish preferr'd,

line_1: Who fed not with the common herd,
line_2: His tray was to the hall preferr'd,

line_1: Some rugged Fellow of the brawny Herd,
line_2: Who after all their Services, preferr'd
Are govern'd by a single word;

line_1: And long attachment waits among the herd;
line_2: When merit pines while clamour is prefer'd,

line_1: When, in my stead, behold! a motley Herd
line_2: Of upstart Witlings to my self preferr'd.

line_1: Wise Nature mocks the wrangling herd;
There — in his commerce with the liveried herd
line_2: Lurks the contagion chiefly to be fear'd.

line_1: The bleeting lambs, and lowing herd,
line_2: At once are waken'd and inspir'd,
For who, but I, till you appear'd

line_1: And Turn superior to the vulgar Herd,
line_2: 'Till One, in whom an outward Mien appear'd,

line_1: Man mixes with the common herd,
line_2: And why are varying schemes prefer'd?
